description: Try our easy to follow Garlic & Caramelized Onion Bhajis recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fritters,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Garlic & Caramelized Onion Bhajis Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a nonstick skillet, add the onion, garlic, and cumin and fry for 5-6 minutes until the onion is golden and softened. Stir in the coriander.
Meanwhile, mix together the flour, baking soda, salt, and water in a bowl and set aside for 10 minutes, then stir in the onion mixture.

Heat a little of the remaining oil in the skillet, add spoonfuls of the onion mixture, fry for 2-3 minutes, and turn halfway through cooking. Transfer to a serving plate and keep warm while frying the remainder of the mixture.
